Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Damen.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #51 51st Reroute near 51st/Union
ShortDescription: Westbound 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted near 1st/Union

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Union.

Eastbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan Reroute near 31st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted near 31st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Millard, 32nd, Central Park, 31st, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 31st/Lawndale.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #29 State Reroute at State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted near State/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Polk, Clark, Roosevelt, State, and resume  regular route, due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
